menu_items.tel_text: Due to busy phone lines, we suggest contacting us through this number.

info.first: The best health inspection team in the country
info.second: The attending physician examines and is responsible for reporting and interpretation
info.third: Professor doctor is responsible for performing endoscopy
info.fourth: Standard room for one person, able to fully rest and have personal privacy
info.fifth: Provide comprehensive, holistic health management and care

contactLine.title: Official LINE
contactLine.subtitle1: Welcome to our official appointment LINE service.
contactLine.subtitle2: We hope to provide better and more efficient assistance for any questions related to health checkup reservations.
contactLine.content1: 1.Please start by clicking "Add Friend" in LINE.
contactLine.content2: 2.Then, use the "QR Code Scanner" on the left to search for
contactLine.subcontent1: "頂好健康管理" and add the official account as a friend.
contactLine.content3: 3.Once you're in the chat room, you can start the conversation!
contactLine.subcontent2: Our staff will respond as soon as possible during working hours~

contactAddress.title: Reservation
contactAddress.subtitle: Taipei Veteran Hospital-Healthcare and Service Center
contactAddress.content: 112 15th Floor, Zhongzheng Building, No. 201, Section 2, Shipai Road, Beitou District, Taipei City

footer.tel_text: Due to high call volumes, please use the 'Contact Us' section wisely
